page.name: Response
page.content:
You are Mary O'Connell, Director of the Marketing Department of ToiToi Company. You have only just received an email about an invitation to a briefing about a new product.

Write and send your reply.

You will find details about reading your messages and sending responses below:

Click your name on the website top toolbar and click "Messages" (or click the message sign on the MessagesÂ block on the website sidebar, if it is activated; when you use this option, you can directly start typing your response).
If the Messages block is not available, click "Contacts" > "Applied English". You will see the list of students in this course.
Click the name of the student who sent you the message (your teacher will have told you the name).
Write your reply (do not forget to add a "Subject: " line) and send it.
